p: In the context of routine public health surveillance, verbal consent was obtained from suspected cases ≥18 years of age and from parents or legal guardians for cases <18 years of age. The study was approved by the Research Ethics Committee at UVRI, the Uganda National Council for Science and Technology, and the Institutional Review Board at Columbia University Medical Center. The study's funders had no role in study design, data analysis and interpretation, manuscript preparation, or decision to publish.
